description.value: Your powerful legs allow you to make sudden and dramatic leaps. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] as a 2-action activity to double the distance you can Leap vertically, or Leap as a 3-action activity to triple the distance you can Leap vertically. You don't automatically fail @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump] for jumping in a different direction than your Stride.
